1.0.name: wordpress/photopress-gallery
1.0.description:
This plugin extends the gallery shortcode to add the option to only include images that match a term contained in a custom taxonomy. This plugin is particularly useful when used in conjunction with the PhotoPress - Image Taxonomies plugin which allows you to easily associate a wide variety of custom meta data with images.

Feature list:

  1. Adds optional "taxonomy" and "term" parameters to the gallery shortcode.
  2. Adds a new value to the gallery shortcode's existing "orderby" parameter called: "include-order". This will ensure that your images are presented in the exact order that you specified using the include parameter.
